relatedBlades.title: Project Alexandria
relatedBlades.copy:
Open source software is the spirit of collaboration, innovation and shared knowledge that drives the Internet forward. Every project is different which is why Project Alexandria, our open source credits program, offers flexibility to suit your varying needs. 

What is available: 
- Upgrade to Cloudflare Pro, Business, or Enterprise plan. 
- Increased requests to Cloudflare Workers and Pages. 
- Increased R2 storage for builds and artifacts. 
- Enhanced Zero Trust access, including Remote Browser Isolation. 

We're dedicated to supporting projects that are not only innovative but also crucial to the continued growth and health of the Internet. To qualify, you must:

- maintain an open source project with a recognized OSS license; and
- operate solely on a non-profit basis and align with the Project's mission.

Apply to receive recurring annual credits with Project Alexandria.
relatedBlades.customPrivacyPolicyText: Acceptance into Project Alexandria and determination of benefits is at Cloudflare's sole discretion. Cloudflare may change or discontinue the Project or any aspect of it (including these terms) at any time without notice. Cloudflare reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Project and any benefits. Credits are non-transferable, nonrefundable, non-redeemable for cash, and may not be sold, purchased, or bartered. You are responsible for paying any potential taxes associated with the value of the credits. Project Alexandria credits may be subject to product-specific usage limitations that may be provided from time to time. You will be required to create a Cloudflare account and upload a valid payment method on file. Your use of our services is also subject to [www.cloudflare.com/terms](https://www.cloudflare.com/terms/).
